reference.title: CommandAddress: To command a address for a node

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: UINT CommandAddress (UINT64 EcuName, BYTE NewAddress, UINT Channel)

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will command a address to the node having ECU NAME as specified.

section.lines: EcuName - ECU NAME of a node for which the address has to be commanded. NewAddress - The new address. Channel - Channel number.
section.title: Returns
section.p: TRUE success. FALSE if the handler is already in the specified state
